sent.orig: Our newspaper is an influential newspaper in this city.
sent.trans: 我们的报纸在本市有很大影响力。

sent.orig: The first newspaper advertisement appeared on the back page of a London newspaper in l625.
sent.trans: 第一张报纸广告于1625年出现在伦敦的一张报纸的最后一页。

sent.orig: Duties: as the overall person charge of each newspaper, ensuring the timely publication of the newspaper.
sent.trans: 职责：兼任各报纸总负责人，具体负责各份报纸，保证各份报纸按时出版。

sent.orig: October 25,2006 ninbo daily newspaper groups launched practicability electronic paper newspaper – ninbo broadcast law.
sent.trans: 2006年10月25日宁波日报报业集团推出实用性电子纸报纸——《宁波播报》。

sent.orig: Newspaper has a long history. The earliest published newspaper appeared in 1566 in Italia.
sent.trans: 报刊历史悠久，最早的印刷报纸于1566年出现在意大利。
